name: RGBPuzzle
description:
RGBPuzzle
  • 26 interesting and exciting levels
  • easy control
  • original gameplay (maybe)
  • saves are work fine, you can continue everytime 
  • I`m very-very like lists

Simple game about three base color of raster graphics. 

Let`s just say RGBPuzzle about importance of each color in overall picture.

Control

▲ ▼ ◄ ► Arrows - move, switch levels in menu.

ESC - escape to menu from gameplay.

R - retry level.

Have fun !
